title: HostingXF
author: HostingXF
content: HostingXF.comFAST, SAFE AND RELIABLE SERVICE.HostingXF.com is not another hosting company, our technicians are specialized in web development, software engineer and other fields. While other companies focus ongiving the basic and classic "host" or "cloud space" we focus more into keeping your project with 99.9% uptime, safe and guarded with daily backups, at HostingXF we even have cheap plans whereour web developer will customize a basic or full website depending to the customer needs.What we offer:* Web Hosting* Domain Registration* Reseller Hosting* Dedicated Servers* Custom forum / blog setup* Custom basic / professional website setup* Team Speak Servers* Argentum Online, MMORPG, Minecraft Servers Game Hosting* Counter Strike 1.6 and Global Offensive Game HostingWhy choose us?* Instant free activation* Web cPanel & Virtualizor* Money back guarantee* Support 24/7 available* Multiple payment methods availableContact us:info@hostingxf.comLive chat on website:https://hostingxf.com/
